alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 1:08AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts from showers and weak thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Madison, north central Beaverhead, southwestern Jefferson and west central Gallatin Counties through 200 AM MDT... At 107 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and weak thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Divide to near Alder. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Boulder, Sheridan, Virginia City, Whitehall, Twin Bridges, Alder, Pony, Silver Star, Harrison, Basin, Norris, Melrose, Mcallister, Laurin, Waterloo, Glen, Cardwell, Lewis And Clark Caverns State Park, and Elk Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
